price: 57. Usun Jannat addal maggo qaynatah yan caxâ mixu loonuuh, faxaanaah esseraanam elle Ion niqmootak.
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā fākihatun walahum mā yaddaʿūna
